introduction: As tryouts for the city swim team approach, Mala's training continues to falter. Despite his struggles, he desperately wants to make the team, even if only as a substitute. Realistically, this summer may be his final opportunity. By chance, Mala catches his fellow players smoking in the school hallway, a violation of regulations. Now it’s time for Mala to choose whether to report them to the school in exchange for a 'chance' at tryouts.
